info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 12 at 8:33PM CDT until April 17 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS Shreveport LA
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana...
Bayou Dorcheat At Lake Bistineau affecting Bossier, Red River, Bienville and Webster Parishes.
For the Bayou Dorcheat...including Springhill, Dixie Inn, Lake Bistineau...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Bayou Dorcheat at Lake Bistineau.
* WHEN...From Wednesday morning to late Wednesday night.
* IMPACTS...At 142.5 feet, Expect some minor flooding of low area camps, however, all access roadways will remain open.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 142.3 feet. - Bankfull stage is 141.0 feet. - Forecast...Lake Bistineau is expected to rise to a crest of 142.5 feet Wednesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 142.5 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 142.6 feet on 04/06/2018. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: https://water.noaa.gov/wfo/SHV
The next statement will be issued Sunday evening at 700 PM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING TO LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT

area.areaDesc: Bienville, LA; Bossier, LA; Red River, LA; Webster, LA
